sen.j: 徳大寺 実淳（とくだいじ さねあつ、文安2年5月17日 (旧暦)（1445年6月22日） - 天文 (元号)2年8月24日 (旧暦)（1533年9月12日））は室町時代の公卿。
sen.e: Saneatsu TOKUDAIJI (May 17, 1445 - August 24, 1533) was a Kugyo (court noble) in the Muromachi period.
Saneatsu TOKUDAIJI (May 17, 1445 - August 24, 1533) was a Kugyo (court noble) in the Muromachi period.
Saneatsu TOKUDAIJI (May 17, 1445 - September 22, 1533) was a Kugyo (court noble) in the Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: May 17 を July 1に、August 24 を September 22 に、それぞれ修正しました。(court noble) を (high court noble) に修正しました。

sen.e: His father was Kinari TOKUDAIJI.
sen.cmt: 用語集では「きみあり (Kimiari)」となっていましたが、Web 検索では「とくだいじ きんあり」と振り仮名がついているものが多かったため、「きんあり (Kinari)」と訳出しました。http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%BE%B3%E5%A4%A7%E5%AF%BA%E5%85%AC%E6%9C%89
sen.e: His father was Kinari TOKUDAIJI.
His father was Kinari TOKUDAIJI.

sen.j: 子に徳大寺公胤、日野内光、維子（近衛尚通正室）。
sen.e: His children were Kintane TOKUDAIJI, Uchimitsu HINO and Fusako (Hisamichi KONOE's lawful wife.)
sen.cmt: 用語集では「きみたね (Kimitane)」となっていましたが、Web 検索では「とくだいじ きんたね」と振り仮名がついているものが多かったため、「きんたね (Kintane)」と訳出しました。http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%BE%B3%E5%A4%A7%E5%AF%BA%E5%85%AC%E8%83%A4
sen.e: His children were Kintane TOKUDAIJI, Uchimitsu HINO and Fusako (Hisamichi KONOE's lawful wife.)
His children were Kintane TOKUDAIJI, Uchimitsu HINO and Fusako (Hisamichi KONOE's lawful wife.)
His go (pen name) was Zenkoin.
His go (pen name) was Zenkoin.
His go (pen name) was Zenkoin.
His homyo (a name given to a person who enters the Buddhist priesthood) was Ninkei.
His Buddhist name was Ninkei.
His Buddhist name was Ninkei.

sen.j: 文安2年（1445年）に徳大寺公有の子として生まれる。
sen.e: In 1445, he was born as a child of Kinari TOKUDAIJI.
In 1445, he was born as a child of Kinari TOKUDAIJI.
In 1445, he was born as a child of Kinari TOKUDAIJI.

sen.j: 寛正3年（1462年）8月5日 (旧暦)、叙従三位。
sen.e: In August 5, 1462, he was appointed to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank.)
On August 5, 1462, he was appointed to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
sen.cmt: prepositions; full stop goes outside of parentheses
sen.e: On September 7, 1462, he was appointed to Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank).
sen.cmt: August 5 をSeptember 7 に修正しました。

sen.j: 文明 (日本)13年（1481年）に内大臣（1481年 - 1485年）となる。
sen.e: In 1481, he became Naidaijin (Minister of the Center) (1481 - 1485.)
In 1481, he became Naidaijin (Minister of the Center, 1481 – 1485).
In 1481, he became Naidaijin (Minister of the Center, 1481 – 1485).

sen.j: 文明17年（1485年）5月4日 (旧暦)、叙従一位。
sen.e: In May 4, 1485, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank.)
On May 4, 1485, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
sen.cmt: prepositions; full stop goes outside of parentheses
sen.e: On June 25, 1485, he was appointed to Juichii (Junior First Rank).
sen.cmt: May 4 をJune 25 に修正しました。

sen.j: 長享元年（1487年）に左大臣（1487年 - 1493年）となる。
sen.e: In 1487, he became Sadaijin (Minister of the Left) (1487 - 1493.)
In 1487, he became Sadaijin (Minister of the Left, 1487 – 1493).
In 1487, he became Sadaijin (Minister of the Left, 1487 – 1493).

sen.j: 永正6年（1509年）に太政大臣（1509年 - 1511年）となる。
sen.e: In 1509, he became Daijo daijin (Grand Minister) (1509 - 1511.)
In 1509, he became Daijo daijin (Grand Minister, 1509 – 1511).
In 1509, he became Daijo daijin (Grand minister of state, 1509 – 1511).
sen.cmt: Grand Minister をGrand minister of state に修正しました。

sen.j: 永正8年（1511年）8月21日 (旧暦)に出家。
sen.e: In August 21, 1511, he entered the priesthood.
On August 21, 1511, he entered the priesthood.
On September 23, 1511, he entered the priesthood.
sen.cmt: August 21をSeptember 23 に修正しました。

sen.e: In 1533, he passed away.
In 1533, he passed away.
In 1533, he passed away.
